module.title: aon
module.p: aon is a cardinal numeral, equivalent to the English one.
The main uses of aon are –

ol.li: When modifying a temporal unit noun, aon can be used to introduce an adverbial phrase of temporal location marking a new reference time in a narrative (without the need for any preposition) – aon latha chunnaic Màiri cù ruadh anns a’ ghàradh one day Mary saw a ginger dog in the garden
